ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 134
ygData.msgSnippet: Concerning the Aqua Lung...the silk lined steel helm used to create it is a gnome-only helm...which worries me that the aqua lung will be restricted to our
ygData.messageBody:
Concerning the Aqua Lung...the "silk lined steel helm" used to create it is
a gnome-only helm...which worries me that the aqua lung will be restricted
to our kindred alone...

Questions: where can the silk-lined steel helm be found? also where can the
coral mesh be located? has anyone found it yet? i presume either Dagnor's or
perhaps OOT. Last but not least...how high in skill can Stalking Probes take
an established tinkerer?

any info is greatly appreciated.
-Ranth Rathan, Tarew Marr
